Functions
load_module
int* load_module(
multiboot_info_t *mbinfo,
const char *module
)

Get the address of a module loaded by GRUB

Parameters
mbinfo
multiboot_info_t*

a structure representing the multiboot information received from GRUB

module
const char*

the name of the module to load

Returns

The address of the loaded GRUB module, or NULL if the module could not be loaded

load_module_by_magic
int* load_module_by_magic(
multiboot_info_t *mbinfo,
const char *magic,
int offset
)

Load a GRUB module given the magic signature to search for

Parameters
mbinfo
multiboot_info_t*

a structure representing the multiboot information received from GRUB

magic
const char*

the magic signature to search for in the module

offset
int

the offset of the magic number within in the GRUB module

Returns

The address of the loaded GRUB module, or NULL if the module could not be loaded
